19 SBOSS::PARAMS::PARAMS()
20 : Verbose(0),
21  K(20),
22  delta(2),
23  epsilon(0.0001)
24 
25 {
26 }

28 SBOSS::SBOSS(const SIMULATOR& simulator, const PARAMS& params,
29  SamplerFactory& sampFact)
30 : Simulator(simulator),
31  Params(params),
32  SampFact(sampFact)
33 {
34  A = Simulator.GetNumActions();
35  S = Simulator.GetNumObservations();
36  SA = S*A;
37  SAS = S*A*S;
38 
39  Am = A*Params.K;
40  SAm = S*Am;
41 
42  //Initialize transition counts for posterior estimation
43  counts = new uint[SAS];
44  countsLastResample = new uint[SAS];
45  std::fill(counts,counts+SAS,0);
46  std::fill(countsLastResample,countsLastResample+SAS,0);
47 
48  countsSum = new uint[SA];
49  std::fill(countsSum,countsSum+SA,0);
50  countsSumLastResample = new uint[SA];
51  std::fill(countsSumLastResample,countsSumLastResample+SA,0);
52 
53 
54  RLPI = new uint[S];
55  V = new double[S];
56 
57  Pm = new double[S*Am*S];
58 
59  //Create reward function for merged model
60  if(Simulator.rsas){
61  Rm = new double[SAm*S];
62  for(uint s=0;s<S;++s){
63  for(uint a=0;a<Am;++a)
64  memcpy(Rm+s*SAm+a*S,Simulator.R+s*SA+(a%A)*S,S*sizeof(double));
65  }
66  }
67  else{
68  Rm = new double[SAm];
69  for(uint s=0;s<S;++s){
70  for(uint a=0;a<Am;++a)
71  Rm[s*Am+a] = Simulator.R[s*A+(a%A)];
72  }
73  }
74  do_sample = true;
75 }
76 
77 SBOSS::~SBOSS()
78 {
79  delete[] counts;
80  delete[] countsLastResample;
81  delete[] countsSum;
82  delete[] countsSumLastResample;
83  delete[] RLPI;
84  delete[] V;
85  delete[] Pm;
86  delete[] Rm;
87 }
88 
89 //Compute the deviation of the means from one posterior to the other,
90 //as done in Precup, Castro 2010.
91 double SBOSS::posteriorDeviation(const uint* counts1,
92  uint sum1,
93  const uint* counts2,
94  uint sum2){
95  double alphamean = SampFact.getAlphaMean();
96  double sum2c = sum2 + alphamean*S;
97  double sum1c = sum1 + alphamean*S;
98  double dev = 0;
99  double tmp;
100  if(sum2 == 0)
101  return 0.0; //no change
102  else{
103  for(uint s=0; s<S; ++s){
104  tmp = fabs(((counts1[s]+alphamean)/sum1c-(counts2[s]+alphamean)/sum2c));
105  //Divide by variance of the marginal for s
106  dev += tmp/sqrt(((counts1[s]+alphamean)*(sum1c-(counts1[s]+alphamean))));
107  }
108  dev *= sqrt((sum1c*sum1c*(sum1c+1)));
109  }
110  return dev;
111 }
112 
113 
114 //bool SBOSS::Update(uint state, uint action, uint observation, double reward)
115 bool SBOSS::Update(uint state, uint action, uint observation, double)
116 {
117  uint ArrayPos = state*SA+S*action;
118  //Update posterior
119  counts[ArrayPos+observation] += 1;
120  countsSum[state*A+action] += 1;
121  SampFact.updateCounts(state,action,observation);
122  //Check resampling criterion
123  if(posteriorDeviation(countsLastResample+ArrayPos,
124  countsSumLastResample[state*A+action],
125  counts+ArrayPos,
126  countsSum[state*A+action]) > Params.delta)
127  do_sample = true;
128 
129  return true;
130 }
131 
132 void SBOSS::createMergedModel(){
133 
134  for(size_t i=0; i<S; ++i){
135  uint iSAm = i*SAm;
136  uint iSA = i*SA;
137  for(size_t a=0; a<A; ++a){
138  //Get a sampler to sample K T(s,a,.) parameters
139  Sampler* TParamSampler = SampFact.getTransitionParamSampler(counts+iSA+a*S,i,a,S);
140  uint kA = 0;
141  for(size_t k=0; k<Params.K; ++k){
142  TParamSampler->getNextTParamSample(Pm+iSAm+(a+kA)*S);
143  kA+=A;
144  }
145  delete TParamSampler;
146  }
147  }
148 }
149 
150 uint SBOSS::SelectAction(uint state)
151 {
152  uint a;
153  if(do_sample){
154  //Sample K MDPs and create merged model
155  createMergedModel();
156  //Solve merged model
157  MDPutils::valueIteration(S,
158  Am,
159  Simulator.rsas,
160  Pm,
161  Rm,
162  Simulator.GetDiscount(),
163  Params.epsilon,
164  RLPI,
165  V);
166  memcpy(countsLastResample,counts,SAS*sizeof(uint));
167  memcpy(countsSumLastResample,countsSum,SA*sizeof(uint));
168  do_sample = false;
169  }
170  //Use computed policy from the merged model
171  a = RLPI[state]%A;
172 
173  return a;
174 }
